snippet: The United Nations said Monday that one of its peacekeeping compounds in South Sudan sustained “material damage” over the weekend when it was hit with five bombs.
abstract: United Nations says that one of its peacekeeping compounds in South Sudan sustained 'material damage' when it was hit with five bombs, which killed two people on the base.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations said Monday that one of its peacekeeping compounds in South Sudan sustained “material damage” over the weekend when it was hit with five bombs.

headline.main: South Sudan: Blasts at U.N. Site
headline.print_headline: South Sudan: Blasts at U.N. Site
